pages.about: About Us - FormaCreativa Main About us Vision Gallery Price list News Services Reviews Team Contact us Main About us Vision Gallery Price list News Services Reviews Team Contact us About Us At FormaCreativa, we are dedicated to transforming your ideas into reality through our expert 3D visualizations and design projects. With a passion for creativity and a commitment to excellence, we bring your visions to life with stunning detail and precision. Our team of experienced professionals works closely with each client to ensure that every project meets their unique needs and exceeds expectations. Founded on the principles of innovation and quality, FormaCreativa has built a reputation for delivering high-quality visuals and custom designs that stand out in the industry. We leverage the latest technologies and creative techniques to provide solutions that are not only visually appealing but also functionally robust. Whether you are looking to create a realistic architectural visualization, a captivating interior design, or any other 3D project, FormaCreativa is your trusted partner in achieving outstanding results. Unlock Your Vision with Our Premier 3D Visualization Services Architectural Visualization Bringing architectural designs to life with stunning 3D visuals. Interior Design Creating beautiful and functional interior spaces with 3D models. Product Rendering High-quality 3D renderings to showcase your products effectively. Landscape Design Designing stunning outdoor environments with detailed 3D visuals. Virtual Tours Immersive virtual tours to explore spaces in a realistic way. 3D Animation Dynamic 3D animations to visualize concepts and designs. Choose Us for Exceptional 3D Visualizations Trust us to bring your vision to life with precision and creativity. Choose Us for Unmatched 3D Visualization Excellence FormaCreativa was founded with a clear vision: to revolutionize the world of 3D visualization and design projects. Our journey began over a decade ago, with a small but passionate team of designers and artists who shared a common goal – to turn creative ideas into breathtaking visual realities. Through dedication, innovation, and an unwavering commitment to quality, we quickly made a name for ourselves in the industry. As we grew, so did our capabilities. We invested in the latest technologies and continuously honed our skills to stay ahead of the curve. Today, FormaCreativa stands as a leader in the field, known for our exceptional attention to detail and personalized approach to every project. Our team of experts works tirelessly to bring our clients’ visions to life, ensuring each project is delivered with precision, creativity, and excellence. Choose us, and let’s create something extraordinary together. pages.policy: Privacy Policy - FormaCreativa Main About us Vision Gallery Price list News Services Reviews Team Contact us Main About us Vision Gallery Price list News Services Reviews Team Contact us Privacy Policy - FormaCreativa Introduction This Privacy Policy outlines how FormaCreativa collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring the confidentiality of your personal data. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to communicate with you, process orders, improve our services, and personalize your experience. We may also use this information for marketing purposes with your consent. Information Sharing We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill our service obligations. Your data may be shared with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, misuse, or alteration. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security of your data. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not operated by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these websites. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your data or request data portability. Please contact us if you wish to exercise these rights. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and if we learn that we have inadvertently gathered such information, we will promptly delete it. Changes to This Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised policy on our website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Retention of Information We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. After that period, your personal data will be securely deleted or anonymized. International Transfers Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction. If you are located outside our jurisdiction and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including personal data, to our servers and process it there. Customer Support Interactions When you contact our customer support team, we may collect and maintain records of your communication to help resolve any issues you might be facing. These records may include your name, contact information, and the details of your inquiry or complaint. We use this information to assist you and improve our customer service operations. Legal Compliance We may disclose your personal information when required to do so by law or in response to lawful requests by public authorities, including to meet national security or law enforcement requirements. We also reserve the right to access, preserve, and disclose any information necessary to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights, property, or safety, and that of our users and others. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach where your personal information is compromised, we will notify you and relevant authorities as required by law. We will take prompt action to mitigate the effects of the breach and prevent future incidents through enhanced security measures. Changes to Ownership In the event of a change in ownership, such as a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your personal information may be transferred to the new owner or successor entity. We will notify you via email or prominent notice on our website about any such change and any choices you may have regarding your personal information. Automated Decision Making We do not engage in automated decision-making processes that could significantly affect you without human intervention. Any automated processing of your personal data is strictly for improving our services and does not have legal or similarly significant effects on you. California Privacy Rights California residents have the right to request information regarding the disclosure of their personal information to third parties for direct marketing purposes during the preceding calendar year. If you are a California resident and would like to make such a request, please contact us using the information provided below. GDPR Compliance If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). These rights include the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data, as well as the right to restrict or object to certain processing activities. We are committed to complying with GDPR requirements when processing personal data of individuals in the EEA. Contact If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at formacreativa@gmail.com.
